about_the_game: Discover the wild beasts in the game and choose from over a dozen unique animals, ranging from carnivores such as Rex Tyrannosaurus and Emperor Crocodiles to herbivores such as Parasaurus. Explore the beautiful scenery and wildlife you may encounter. Every creature has its own strengths and weaknesses, but with a skill tree, you can further expand it on your growth path. The wild animals (AI) you discover will keep you alert because exploration always has risks and rewards. You can conquer all lands with other players. Players can freely challenge each other's authority or land/resources.
detailed_description: Discover the wild beasts in the game and choose from over a dozen unique animals, ranging from carnivores such as Rex Tyrannosaurus and Emperor Crocodiles to herbivores such as Parasaurus. Explore the beautiful scenery and wildlife you may encounter. Every creature has its own strengths and weaknesses, but with a skill tree, you can further expand it on your growth path. The wild animals (AI) you discover will keep you alert because exploration always has risks and rewards. You can conquer all lands with other players. Players can freely challenge each other's authority or land/resources.
name: 白垩纪-龙岛

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12600/AMD R7-3700X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: In the game, you can choose to become a dinosaur, a herbivorous dinosaur, or a carnivorous dinosaur. In this multiplayer ecosystem, you can gradually grow from a young dinosaur baby to a top predator! But please remember, the ancient law of the Cretaceous period was to survive at all costs!
